scripts.local: ./node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up -e local --config ./src/database.json && node -r dotenv/config -r esm src/app.ts dotenv_config_path=./src/.env
scripts.test: tsc && DATABASE_URL=postgres://enso-street:password@localhost:5432/enso-street-test ./node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up -e test && ALGOLIA_ITEM_INDEX=test-enso-street-items DATABASE_URL=postgres://enso-street:password@localhost:5432/enso-street-test REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 sessionSecret=this-is-a-session-secret nyc ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --exit -r esm
scripts.test-no-coverage: tsc && DATABASE_URL=postgres://enso-street:password@localhost:5432/enso-street-test ./node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate up -e test && ALGOLIA_ITEM_INDEX=test-enso-street-items DATABASE_URL=postgres://enso-street:password@localhost:5432/enso-street-test REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 sessionSecret=this-is-a-session-secret ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --exit -r esm
